attributes.text: It consists of two content lines followed by a blank line
The first content line indicates debug mode
The second content line indicates 1 attempt left
It is the top line of game output

description.text: The game displays a password list

attributes.text: It consists of 13 content lines followed by a blank line
Each content line contains one password
It is directly below the header

description.text: The game prompts for a guess

attributes.text: It indicates the player should enter a password
It is directly below the password list

description.text: The player enters a guess and presses the enter key
The game displays a failure outcome

attributes.text: It contains three content lines separated by two blank lines
The first and second content lines indicate failure
The third content line is a prompt to press enter for exit
It is directly below the prompt for guess

description.text: The player presses the enter key to end the program
